text: Kumudini Mohapatra (1930-2006) was an Odia-language Indian author and translator from the state of Odisha. Her travelogue Americara Ghara O Gharani and science fiction Chandra Abhimukhe Abhijaan are a few of her popular works. Mohapatra was married to Gokulananda Mahapatra. She was active in Science- writing during 1947-1948. == Early life == Mohapatra was married to Gokulananda Mahapatra. The couple had five children; Jyotshna, Girija, Rashmi, Snigdha, and Nanda Nandan. == References == Category:20th-century Indian women writers Category:1930 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Odia-language writers Category:Indian science fiction writers Category:20th-century Indian translators Category:Women writers from Odisha
